text: Hagi kasegere ugagota hu'naza vahe'ene, Farisi vahe'mo'zama, kazageno kumi vahe'ene takisi zagoma e'neri'za vahe'ene, magopima manineno tine ne'zama nenazageno, na'a higeno takesi e'neri'za vahe'ene kumi vahe'enena magopina ne'zana nene? Hu'za amage'ma nentaza disaipol nagara zmantahige'naze.
